src_original: tadyathā - kāye kāyānudarśasmṛtyupasthānam,  vedanāyāṃ vedanānudarśasmṛtyupasthānam,  citte cittānudarśasmṛtyupasthānam,
anutpannānāṃ samutpādaḥ /  utpannānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam /  anutpannānāṃ punaranutpādaśceti //
tadyathā - chandasamādhiprahāṇāya saṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādaḥ /  evaṃ cittaṛddhipādaḥ /
